Section Parallax

A nice parallax effect working on mobile, but only one is possible on a page.

File to include

@include "components/parallax";

Code

See the demo here. 
<div class="container-parallax container-section-parallax">
    <main class="container">
            <section>
                <h3>Title container</h3>
                <p>
                    Content container.
                </p>
            </section>
    </main>
</div>

<section class="wrapper-section-parallax">
    <div class="section-parallax-img" style="background: url(/assets/images/cover-parallax.jpg)"></div>
    <div class="title-section-parallax">
            <h1 class="display">Title</h1>
    </div>
</section>

<div class="container-parallax container-section-parallax">
    <main class="container">
            <section>
                <h3>Title container</h3>
                <p>
                    Content container.
                </p>
            </section>
    </main>
</div>
